metadata.title: Labaran Duniya
metadata.summary: Ziyarci shafin BBC Hausa domin samun rahotannin bidiyo da hotuna kan labarun Najeriya da Nijar da ma sauran sassan duniya baki daya.

headlines.headline: Batun saka hijabi ya janyo ce-ce-ku-ce

items.summary: A cikin bidiyon wata mata da ta yi shiga ba hijabi ta sauya ra'ayinta saboda yadda wani mai shago ya fifita mai hijabi fiye da ita.

relatedItems.summary: Najeriya ta kai wasan daf da karshe a gasar cin kofin nahiyar Afirka, bayan da ta yi nasara a kan Afirka ta Kudu ranar Laraba.

headlines.headline: Matar da ta shekara uku da gawar mahaifiyarta a gida

items.summary: 'Yan sanda sun yi amanna cewar marigayiyar mai shkeara 71 ta mutu ne sakamakon faduwa da ta yi a shekarar 2016 amma 'yarta ba ta ba ta kulawar da ta dace ba.

headlines.headline: Matasa sun sace tare da kashe wani yaro a Kano

items.summary: Jami'an tsaro sun ce an sace yaron ne da hadin bakin wanda ke raka shi makaranta, inda suka nemi a ba su naira miliyan 50.

headlines.headline: Shan kayan zaki na janyo 'cutar daji'

items.summary: Wani bincike ya nuna cewa akwai alaka tsakanin ababen sha masu zaki da cutar daji duk da cewa ba a gano takamaiman dalili ba.

headlines.headline: An yi yunkurin 'juyin mulki a Sudan

items.summary: Gwamnatin soji ta riko a Sudan ta sanar da dakile yunkurin juyin mulki a ranar Alhamis tare da cafke jami'an tsaro 16 da ake zargi da hannu a lamarin.

items.summary: Ranar Alhamis 11 ga watan Yuli aka yi bikin Ranar Yawan Al'ummar Duniya, inda a bana adadin al'ummar duniya ya kai 7.7 biliyan.

headlines.headline: 'Yan Shi'a na zanga-zanga a fadin Najeriya

items.summary: 'Yan kungiyar Shi'a sun shiga kwana na uku na zanga-zanga a Abuja, amma lamarin ya bazu har zuwa Lagos da Kaduna.

headlines.headline: Mutum 11 sun mutu a hatsarin jirgin ruwa a Nijar

items.summary: Wani jirgin ruwa ne dauke da mutane kusan 40 ya nutse yayin da suke neman ketara gulbin daga wannan gaba zuwa waccar.

headlines.headline: Majalisa ta nemi Buhari ya saki Zakzaky

items.summary: Majalisar ta amince da wannan kuduri ne kwana guda bayan taho-mu-gamar da aka yi tsakanin 'yan sanda da kuma mabiya Sheikh Ibrahim Elzakazaky a harabar majalisar.

headlines.headline: NAFDAC za ta hana sayar da Sniper

items.summary: NAFDAC ta sanar da hakan ne a ranar Alhamis inda ta kara da cewa haramcin zai hada da yi da kuma shigo da duk magani mai dauke da sinadarin Dichlorvos cikin kasar.

headlines.headline: Birtaniya matsoraciya ce - Rouhani

items.summary: Rouhani ya kuma gargadi Birtaniya ta kuka-da-kanta kan abin da zai biyo baya sakamakon kwace jirgin ruwan dakon man kasar da ta yi a makon da ya wuce.

headlines.headline: Afcon: A wane fanni kasashen da ke fafatawa suka yi zarra?

items.summary: Amma baya ga wasan kwallon, mun ga dacewar a dan yi raha da wasa kwakwalwa ta wani bangare, kamar tambayar: "Wa zai yi nasara a wasu bangarorin a AFCON baya ga kwallon kafa?

headlines.headline: APC ba ta isa ta kore ni ba – Buba Galadima

items.summary: Buba Galadima ya ce kasancewar yana daya daga cikin mutanen da suka kafa jam'iyya mai mulki ta APC, hakan ya mayar da shi dan jam'iyya na din-din-din.

media.title: Har yanzu ni dan jam'iyyar APC ne - Buba Galadima

synopses.short: Buba Galadima ya bayyana cewa har yanzu fa shi dan jam'iyya mai mulki ne ta APC
synopses.long: Buba Galadima ya bayyana cewa har yanzu fa shi dan jam'iyya mai mulki ne ta APC domin kuwa yana daya daga cikin mutum tara da suka kafa ta. Sannan kuma ya ce ya goyi bayan jam'iyyar adawa ta PDP ne saboda sun yi hadaka da ita.

media.caption: Buba Galadima ya bayyana cewa har yanzu fa shi dan jam'iyya mai mulki ne ta APC

headlines.headline: An buga wasan Najeriya da South Africa a Twitter

items.summary: Tuni 'yan Najeriya suka fara kuri a Twitter tare da canza wa kungiyar Bafana Bafana suna zuwa "Banana Banana", su kuma 'yan Afirka Ta Kudu suka kira su da "Super Ego".

headlines.headline: Buhari ya jinjina wa Super Eagles

items.summary: Kwallon da William Troost-Ekong ya zura ana dab da tashi ita ce ta bai wa Najeriya damar zuwa wasan kusa da na karshe bayan ta doke Afirka ta Kudu da ci 2-1.

headlines.headline: Me ya sa ake sauya tunanin 'ya'yan Musulmi a China?

items.summary: Kasar China na kebe dubban kananan yara Musulmi 'yan kabilar Uighur a wasu makarantun kwana domin aiwatar da wannan bukata.

indexImage.altText: Missing in China; some of the family portraits handed to us in Turkey by Uighur parents looking for information about their children back home in Xinjiang

headlines.headline: Ko kun san 'cutar' da ka iya samun 'Yan madigo?

items.summary: Matan da ke saduwa da mata jinsinsu na iya kamuwa da sankarar mahaifa kuma ya kamata a yi musu gwaji, a cewar kwararru a harkar lafiya.

headlines.headline: Me ya sa Larabawa ke daukar Isra'ila da Iran barazana?

items.summary: Wani gagarumin bincike da aka yi ya nuna cewa Larabawa da yawa a Gabas Ta Tsakiya da Arewacin Afirka sun bar addininsu.

items.summary: Labarin Skinned ya haska rayuwar Ejem, wadda ta fito daga wata al'umma inda 'yan mata suke fita tsirara daga wasu shekaru har sai sun samu miji.

headlines.headline: Kalli hotunan barnar da rikicin 'yan Shi'a ya haifar

items.summary: Duka 'yan sanda da 'yan Shi'a sun zargi juna kan yamutsin da ya faru, wanda ya kai ga dage zaman Majalisar Wakilai a ranar Talata.

indexImage.altText: Tarzoma tsakanin 'yan sanda da 'yan Shi'a a Abuja
indexImage.caption: Fire fighters extinguish a fire coming out from a vehicle following clashes between security operatives and supporters of an imprisoned leader of the Islamic Movement of Nigeria (IMN) Ibrahim Zakzaky at the premises of national assembly building in Nigeria"s capital Abuja, on July 9, 2019. - Supporters of an imprisoned Shiite cleric clashed on July 8, 2019 with security forces around Nigeria"s parliament building, leaving a number of wounded, including two police, the authorities and witneses said.

headlines.headline: Hotuna: 'Yan kwallo, masunta da manoma masu cike da fushi

items.summary: Wasu hotuna da aka zaba na abubuwan da suka faru a nahiyar Afirka ko kuma abin da ya samu 'yan Afirkar a wasu nahiyoyin.

indexImage.altText: Kenya's midfielder Philemon Otieno (L) heads the ball next to Senegal's forward Sadio Mane during the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations (CAN) Group C football match between Kenya and Senegal at the 30 June Stadium in the Egyptian capital Cairo on July 1, 2019.
indexImage.caption: On Monday Kenyan footballer Philomeno Philemon Otieno got ahead of Senegal's Sadio Mane during the Africa Cup of Nations match. It wasn't enough to stay ahead as Senegal won 3-0.

items.name: Labaran Talabijin
items.summary: Ku kalli labaran talabijin a duk lokacin da ku ke bukata wanda mu ke gabatarwa daga ranar Litinin zuwa Juma'a da karfe takwas na dare a agogon GMT.

headlines.headline: Sakon WhatsApp zai iya kai mutum gidan yari

items.summary: Gwamnati ta ce an kafa dokar ne saboda yadda mutane ke shiga intanet suna abin da suka ga dama, da ya hada da tayar da hankali da bata sunan mutane.

headlines.headline: Ya za ku yi idan kuka ga damisa a tsakar dakinku?

items.summary: Google ya saki wani sabon tsari inda dabbobi 'kamar a zahiri' ke bayyana a zahiri a wasu na'urorin wayar Android.

headlines.headline: Facebook 'ba zai cire bidiyon bogi na Zuckerberg ba'

items.summary: Kamfanin Facebook ya ce ba zai cire wani bidiyon da aka sauya muryar shugabansa Mark Zuckerberg ba daga Instagram.

headlines.headline: Facebook ya rufe kamfanin Isra'ila da ya yi katsalandan a zaben Najeriya

items.summary: Kamfanin ya ce wadanda suka aikata abin da Facebook din ya kira "aikin rashin da'a" sun batar da kama a Najeriya da Senegal da Togo da Angola da Nijar da kuma Tunisia.
